name: First Time Hunting
description:
You play as Bob who just started hunting, in a dangerous area with a lot of aggressive and bloodthirsty animals. 

A topdown, endless shooter made for Mini Jam 40: Hunters with the limitation to only use mouse input.

Left click: Shoot

Right click: Place a marker which Bob will walk to.

The game is best played in full screen (see button bottom left).

Background tiles from: https://opengameart.org/content/grass-tileset-16x16 and the rest of the art is made by me in the jam periode. Same goes for code.
